title: Timeline
description: I have had the opportunity to work and study at a number of institutions. Outlined below is a list of some of the things I’ve done. A full CV is located at the bottom of the page.

items.title: Handwashing
items.text: I have been an software engineer at Apple since 2016. During that time, I have been developing software features for the Apple Watch and learning about on–device personalization and machine learning. Most recently I have joined the Machine Intelligence team continue to pursue on-device machine learning. For watchOS 7 we worked to create an experience for interactive Handwashing tracking helping people to stay healthy.

items.title: Siri Watch Face
items.text: Previously I worked on the watch faces team and played a cirtical role in creating the Siri Watch Face. By using on-device personalization this watch face is able to suggest the right content at the right time.

items.title: Siri Shortcuts on the Siri Watch Face
items.text: I was lucky enough to be able to present some of our work at WWDC 2018 where we had enabled 3rd party integration on the Siri Watch Face!

items.title: University of Minnesota
items.text: I graduated from the University of Minnesota in 2016 with a degree in Computer Engineering.

items.title: Epic
items.text: In 2015, I had an internship at Epic where I was helping to build an iPad app which assists dermatologist in their documentation.

items.title: Seagate
items.text: I also was an intern at Seagate working on VLSI design.

items.title: VizByWiki
items.text:
While a student at the University of Minnesota, I worked as a research assistant in GroupLens.

VizByWiki is a project to automatically generate supporting visualizations for news articles. Our paper was published at WWW 2018.

items.title: Atlasify
items.text: I helped build Atlasify–a system that allows you to create a map of anything! By calculating the semantic relatedness, the system is able to generate a map show which places are highly related to the search term. The following example shows which countries are related to World War II.
